title: Actions Runners Registration
description: A way to register actions self-hosted runners.

token.description: A short-lived token coming back from the c2c-actions-runtime that will be used by the self-hosted-runner for direct registration.

token_schema.description: The auth schema the token was created with.

url.description: A URL endpoint from the c2c-actions-runtime that will be posted to by the self-hosted runner for direct registration.
